alert.note: Alert for Coastal Duval; South Central Duval; Trout River; Western Duval (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 07 at 9:03AM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of eastern Duval County through 930 AM EDT... At 903 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Jacksonville, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Minor flooding due to heavy rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor flooding due to heavy rainfall is possible. Locations impacted include... Jacksonville, Unf, Arlington, Neptune Beach, Cisco Gardens, Ortega, Craig Field, San Pablo, Fort Caroline and Nas Jax. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Duval; South Central Duval; Trout River; Western Duval
